subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|rs=火08|grade=4}}

# suffix after nouns to express likeness
# and; and then
# so, be as it is
# and therefore
# however (as [[shikashi]])
# a certain thing

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|ぜん}}

# Indicates a state (no specific semantic content)
